short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal and Copy the password hidden in the form of asterisks signs on any web page with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension facilitates the direct copying or viewing of passwords from input fields containing asterisk signs on any currently open web page.
